title: McAfee AntiVirus 2025 | Real-Time PC Protection from New and Evolving Threats | Download
description: With McAfee AntiVirus you get award-winning antivirus protection that safeguards your device from the latest threats including viruses, malware, ransomware, and spyware. Enjoy safe browsing with real-time threat detection and a powerful firewall to block malicious websites and unauthorized access. McAfee AntiVirus provides device security that keeps your personal information and online activities protected.
